text: Motion

Koito-chan... nervous?
It's alright.

T-There's...!
There's no problem at all...!
Motion
Motion
AD

──aaaand that's enough!
If Noctchill can leave the stage now, please～
Eh? Now?

Huh～?
We didn't even get to the bridge yet...

Yeah, okay, move along, please.
We need the next ones in.
Motion
Program Director

──Excuse me, sorry. Can we have a little bit more time,
just for our check of the acoustics and whatnot──

Whoa, nononono, live singing is out of the question.
We're doing playback.

Sorry, I know I'm barging in.
...is that what we'd be doing?

Yeah... uh, you weren't seriously expecting a live
concert to happen here, right!? Nonononono, no way!

Just look at herl. She can barely even make a peep, right?
It's taking all she's got just for the choreography!
Motion
Motion
Motion

I-I'm very sorry...!
F-For how... earlier, I...
Motion

I-I'll be fine next time, so...!
Um, for the live──

I mean, you're not toe to toe with L'Antica, are you, really?
And we didn't get the staff on deck for a live performance, anyway.
Motion

But, that's...!
No, even so, if we could've just been consulted about this──

Oh, and Asakura-kun, right? She's gonna be the main
focus for the cameras, both for the song and talk.

Yes,
gonna do my best.
Motion

──None of this is what we've been told. Contrarily,
this was all we were going to get at best.

Aha～
Looks like things aren't looking up～...

W──we were all...
becoming able to sing properly, dance properly...
